alert.note: Alert for Rabun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 17 at 3:30AM EST until February 18 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 3 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Rabun County. * WHEN...From noon today to 3 AM EST Friday, with the strongest gusts occurring after sunset this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusts may be locally higher in regions of heavy rain showers tonight.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
